code: import axios from'axios';import{FETCH_PRODUCTS,FETCH_PRODUCT}from'../types';export const fetchProducts=()=>async dispatch=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/products');dispatch({type:FETCH_PRODUCTS,payload:response.data});}catch(error){console.error(error);}};export const fetchProduct=productId=>async dispatch=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`/api/products/${productId}`);dispatch({type:FETCH_PRODUCT,payload:response.data});}catch(error){console.error(error);}};
